title: Mercado Libre SLA
description: My responsibilities include facilitating effective communication between teams, ensuring smooth and aligned collaboration on projects. title: Private programming teacher
description: As a private programming tutor, my responsibility is to provide personalized and well-structured classes, with didactic material that allows students to learn and understand the topics addressed in an effective way.

title: ORT Argentina - System Analyst
description: Systems analysts are dedicated to study, design and develop technological solutions to improve business processes, creating efficient information systems based on the needs of the organization.

title: TOBS

title: National Technological University - Systems Engineering
description: The Systems Engineering program focuses on the design, development and maintenance of computer systems. Systems engineers are experts in programming, databases, networks and computer security. Their objective is to create efficient technological solutions adapted to the needs of companies and organizations.

title: Technical school ORT
